last_episode_to_air.name: The Person
last_episode_to_air.overview: Now an overextended gallery owner, Darby relishes some much-needed alone time during a friend's New Year's Eve wedding. The ceremony fosters a new appreciation for her perfectly imperfect life.

name: Love Life
overview: A romantic comedy anthology series which follows a different protagonist each season on the journey from first love to last love, with each half-hour episode chronicling one of their relationships. The first season centers on Darby, who runs a "historically significant butts" tour for a company headed by McNairy's Bradley.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A millennial New Yorker is on a quest to find her "person," with each episode telling the winding, relatable story of one that got away.
